mapper.insert: insert into MGV_SUPPORT_ONE (one_title, one_content, one_filename, user_id, user_name, user_email, location_no, theater_no, category_no, one_guest_name, one_guest_email, one_guest_password) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{fileName}, #{user.id}, #{user.name}, #{user.email}, #{location.no}, #{theater.no}, #{category.no}, #{guestName}, #{guestEmail}, #{guestPassword});
mapper.select: SELECT A.ONE_NO as no, A.ONE_TITLE as title, A.ONE_CONTENT as content, A.ONE_ANSWERED as answered, A.ONE_DELETED as deleted, A.ONE_FILENAME as fileName, A.ONE_UPDATE_DATE as updateDate, A.ONE_CREATE_DATE as createDate, A.USER_ID as "user.id", A.LOCATION_NO as "location.no", B.LOCATION_NAME as "location.name", A.THEATER_NO as "theater.no", C.THEATER_NAME as "theater.name", A.CATEGORY_NO as "category.no", D.CATEGORY_NAME as "category.name" FROM MGV_SUPPORT_ONE A left outer join MGV_LOCATION B on A.LOCATION_NO = B.LOCATION_NO left outer join MGV_THEATERS C on A.THEATER_NO = C.THEATER_NO inner join MGV_SUPPORT_CATEGORIES D on A.CATEGORY_NO = D.CATEGORY_NO WHERE A.ONE_NO = #{value} and A.ONE_DELETED = 'N'
mapper.update:
UPDATE MGV_SUPPORT_ONE
ONE_TITLE = #{title},
ONE_CONTENT = #{content},
ONE_ANSWERED = #{answered},
ONE_DELETED = #{deleted},
ONE_UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate},
ONE_CREATE_DATE = #{createDate},
ONE_FILENAME = #{fileName},
WHERE ONE_NO= #{no}
mapper.select: SELECT CATEGORY_NO as no, CATEGORY_NAME as name, CATEGORY_TYPE as type FROM MGV_SUPPORT_CATEGORIES where CATEGORY_TYPE = #{value}
SELECT location_no as no, location_name as name from MGV_LOCATION

SELECT A.theater_no as no, A.theater_name as name, A.location_no as "location.no", B.location_name as "location.name" from MGV_THEATERS A, MGV_LOCATION B where A.location_no = B.location_no and A.location_no = #{value}
